{"id":1818195873,"question_id":4048,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"2 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1762051855,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"39 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1818195873/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Time to Complete All Deliveries","memory":"18 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def check(x, d, r):\n        mul = math.lcm(*r)\n        t0 = d[0] - (x // r[1] - x // mul)\n        t1 = d[1] - (x // r[0] - x // mul)\n        return x - (x // r[1]) - (x // r[0]) + (x // mul) >= max(t0, 0) + max(t1, 0)\n        \n    def minimumTime(self, d: List[int], r: List[int]) -> int:\n        left = 0\n        right = 10**16\n\n        while left < right:\n            mid = left + (right - left) // 2\n            if Solution.check(mid, d, r):\n                right = mid\n            else: \n                left = mid + 1\n        return left","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-time-to-complete-all-deliveries","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1337}
